title: New NFL Year Begins, Joe Thomas Retires, McCarron To Bills, FA Winners/Losers (Football 03/14)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson and John Breech to discuss the official start to the league year with free agents finally allowed to ink their deals. The guys start by discussing the Bills signing of AJ McCarron and how, if it all, it affects Buffalo's draft plans. Will, Ryan and John also break down Joe Thomas' retirement, and the releases of Ndamukong Suh and Tyrann Mathieu. Plus, winners/losers of free agency to this point!
